item.description: The app server is not available in your country. The video is not available in your location. The page is not available in your computer So what the feel about above the sentence, while your friends or someone else could see that not existed page??? It’s a serious question??? The reason why I wrote this article is that after Wikipedia was blocked, I deeply feel the domestic the threshold of access to knowledgeThe easy and flexible access to first-hand knowledge is high-CNKI, the libraries of various universities are not open to the outside world, and there are so few public resources.
